skills.desc_zh: 串联需求、选型、审美、实现、验收与自评，输出统一流水线产物。
skills.desc_en: Orchestrates the full UI pipeline from requirements to acceptance with unified artifacts.

skills.desc_zh: 通过结构化追问补全模糊需求，生成 PRD、问题清单与风格档案。
skills.desc_en: Clarifies ambiguous requirements via structured questions and generates PRD artifacts.

skills.desc_zh: 整合选型、审美、生成、重构、验收与自评，收敛端到端交付。
skills.desc_en: Consolidates selection, design, generation, refactoring, and quality closure.

skills.desc_zh: 执行 UI 组件库推荐、评估与对比，给出可落地决策。
skills.desc_en: Provides deterministic UI library recommendation, evaluation, and trade-off output.

skills.desc_zh: 沉淀选型流程、ADR 和评审策略，支持团队化决策。
skills.desc_en: Supplies selection workflow, ADR patterns, and review strategies.

skills.desc_zh: 提供视觉诊断、风格方向和设计令牌建议。
skills.desc_en: Delivers visual critique, style direction, and token-oriented guidance.

skills.desc_zh: 将审美规范转化为可执行的生成约束与视觉规则。
skills.desc_en: Turns visual standards into generation-ready constraints and style rules.

skills.desc_zh: 按结构规划→组件实现→优化→验收四步法推进实现。
skills.desc_en: Executes implementation via a four-step generation workflow.

skills.desc_zh: 先锁定用户指定样式范围，再允许修改，越界即阻断。
skills.desc_en: Locks style-edit scope before changes and blocks out-of-scope edits.

skills.desc_zh: 生成图标清单、规范与可复用 SVG/Canvas 资源。
skills.desc_en: Generates icon manifests, specs, and reusable SVG/Canvas assets.

skills.desc_zh: 识别拆分时机并执行组件抽离与回归验证。
skills.desc_en: Extracts reusable components based on refactor thresholds.

skills.desc_zh: 检查结构、命名、类型、性能和一致性，给出修复路径。
skills.desc_en: Enforces frontend standards across structure, typing, performance, and quality.

skills.desc_zh: 按多维标准执行验收并输出发布建议。
skills.desc_en: Runs multi-dimension acceptance checks and release recommendations.

skills.desc_zh: 从代码、视觉、交互、审美四个维度执行交付前自评。
skills.desc_en: Performs pre-delivery self-review across code, visual, interaction, and aesthetics.

skills.desc_zh: 完成项目初始化、工具链配置与质量门禁落地。
skills.desc_en: Builds project scaffolding, tooling setup, and initial quality gates.

skills.desc_zh: 设计组件库层次、令牌系统、变体策略与发布流程。
skills.desc_en: Designs component-library architecture, token system, and release process.

skills.desc_zh: 识别 app 工作区技术基线、组件资产和目录约束。
skills.desc_en: Detects workspace baseline, component assets, and directory constraints.

skills.desc_zh: 校验双语入口与多平台包装结构完整性，保障分发一致性。
skills.desc_en: Validates bilingual entries and multi-platform packaging structure consistency.
